import { Component, ViewChild, ElementRef, ComponentRef, AfterViewInit } from '@angular/core'; import { GridSquaresComponent } from '../grid-squares/grid-squares.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-game-grid', templateUrl: './game-grid.component.html', styleUrls: ['./game-grid.component.css'] }) export class GameGridComponent { title = 'Minefield' colArray: number[] = []; rowArray: number[] = []; bombArray: boolean[] = []; columns = 4; rows = 10; bombs = 6; ngOnInit() { } //// Generate grid and randomise bomb locations setDimension() { this.colArray = []; this.rowArray = []; this.bombArray = []; for (let i = 0; i < this.columns; i++) { this.colArray.push(i); } for (let i = 0; i < this.rows; i++) { this.rowArray.push(i); } for (let i = 0; i < this.rows * this.columns; i++) { if (i < this.bombs) { this.bombArray.push(true); } else { this.bombArray.push(false); } } this.bombArray.sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5); } //// Event emitted from square, use coordinates to select adjacent squares checkAdjacentSquares(coordinates: [number, number]) { let row = coordinates[1]; let column = coordinates[0] if (column - 1 >= 0) { this.bombArray[1] = false; } if (column + 1 < this.columns) { } if (row - 1 >= 0) { } if (row + 1 < this.rows) { } } }
